abstract: The site rapgenius.com, which offers annotated song lyrics, acknowledged that it had violated Google’s rules regarding optimizing search results.
snippet: The site rapgenius.com, which offers annotated song lyrics, acknowledged that it had violated Google’s rules regarding optimizing search results.
lead_paragraph: Google has apparently punished a provocative music-lyrics website after learning it had unscrupulously tried to improve its search rankings.

headline.main: Google Penalizes Rap Genius for Gaming Search Rank
headline.print_headline: Google Punishes Site In Ranking Scheme
